SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.controller

Class TrendController

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.controller.TrendController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/trends") @CrossOrigin(origins="*", allowedHeaders="*", methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}) public class TrendController extends Object
REST Controller for managing trends. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations and other utility functions related to trends.

      Returns:

    • getTrendById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Trend> getTrendById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific trend by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the trend to retrieve
      Returns:
      the trend with the specified ID, or 404 if not found

      Adds a new trend.
      Parameters:
      trend - the trend to add
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created trend

    • updateTrend

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateTrend(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Trend trend)
      Updates a trend by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the trend to update
      trend - the updated trend details
      Returns:
      a confirmation of the update

      Returns:
      a confirmation of the deletion

      Parameters:
      trendId - the ID of the trend

      a confirmation of the association

      Parameters:
      trendId - the ID of the trend
      categoryId - the ID of the category
      Returns:
      a confirmation of the dissociation

    • setTrendPopularity

      @PostMapping("/{trendId}/setPopularity/{score}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> setTrendPopularity(@PathVariable Long trendId, @PathVariable int score)
      Associates a trend with a popularity score.
      Parameters:
      trendId - the ID of the trend to associate with the score
      score - the popularity score to set for the trend
      Returns:
      a confirmation of the association

    • getTrendPopularity

      @GetMapping("/{trendId}/getPopularity") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getTrendPopularity(@PathVariable Long trendId)
      Retrieves the popularity score of a specified trend.
      Parameters:
      trendId - the ID of the trend whose popularity score to retrieve
      Returns:
      the popularity score of the specified trend
